resources.string: "The Quissteling app gives a digital experience by means of a quiz. In order to play the quiz first a minigame must be played. On the map you will find where minigames are found. After finishing a minigame successfully you will receive a code. When you press the button in the top right of the app you will be able to put this code in and start with answering quiz questions. \\n \\n When you have answered a question correctly you will receive a score for this. Your total score is viewable in the top of the navigation bar. If you want to know how your score compares in comparison to other Quissteling users, then you can press on the top-left button to go to the leaderboard. In the leaderboard you can also find any prizes you may have won. Prizes are awarded at the end of the day according to the leaderboard positions. In addition to that, there is also a small chance to win a price after correctly answering any quiz question. "
Unfortunately you got the question wrong!
